name: Word Search Game in English
description:
Word search game is completely free, created to help kids, adults, students and everyone learn English words in a fun way.

It is also a brain game and addictive to play.

How is our game unique?
★ Two game modes are available
★ Main game - 500 word categories with 10000+ unique words
★ Infinity game - Unlimited randomly generated word puzzles
★ Simple and fast interface
★ You can use hints to reveal words that are difficult to find

How to play the Game?
Swipe your finger in any one of 8 directions ie. Left to Right, Right to Left, Top to Bottom, Bottom to Top and diagonally to find out 8 hidden words from the 11x11 grid.

If you loved our game, share it with your friends. Contact us via email: viyan.services@gmail.com for any feedback.
